body:
Installing packages that require a license file (seen with intel and pgi packages today) appear to hang forever after the license file is supplied interactively during installation. Re-starting installation with the license file already in place works.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install pgi@19.4 %gcc@4.8.5
```

### Error Message

```console
joan5896  95984  95849  0 08:51 pts/25   00:00:00          \_ python /curc/sw/spack-experimental/bin/spack install pgi@19.4 %gcc@4.8.5
joan5896  96013  95984  5 08:51 pts/25   00:00:08              \_ [vim] <defunct>
```


### Information on your system

Running on RHEL7.6

Using spack develop, 3ce90741a3dd82b22139f82a555e0158c796c169
title: stuck defunct editor after interactive license installation
